actions.name: Wave Master

cost.trigger: The user declares a Water-type attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user declares a Water-type attack.
Effect: The triggering attack loses the [Contact] trait, if it had it, until the user's next activation, and has its Range increased by 2.

actions.name: Wave Master
actions.description: Passive: The user gains +2 to their Swim Score.

system.description:
Trigger: The user declares a Water-type attack.
Effect: The triggering attack loses the [Contact] trait, if it had it, until the user's next activation, and has its Range increased by 2. Passive: The user gains +2 to their Swim Score.
